snippet: Investigators looking into the fatal train derailment said that they had taken the cellphone to determine whether the engineer made calls or sent text messages while driving the train.
abstract: Authorities investigating Amtrak train derailment near Philadelphia are searching engineer Brandon Bostian's cellphone to determine whether he took calls or sent text messages while operating train.
lead_paragraph: Investigators looking into the fatal train derailment said that they had taken the cellphone to determine whether the engineer made calls or sent text messages while driving the train.

headline.main: Cellphone of Amtrak Engineer to Be Studied
headline.print_headline: Cellphone of Engineer to Be Studied
